src:
Sutra pretežno oblačno, ponegde sa slabom kišom

02 Nov 2019, 12:15

U Srbiji će sutra biti pretežno oblačno, ponegde sa slabom kišom, dok se više padavina očekuje na zapadu i jugozapadu, saopštio je Republički hidrometeorološki zavod (RHMZ).Vetar će biti slab i umeren, u planinskim predelima i košavskom području povremeno jak, južni i jugoistočni, koji će na jugu Banata dostizati i udare olujne jačine. Jutarnja temperatura biće od sedam do 12 , a najviša dnevna od 16 do 22 stepena Celzijusa.U Beogradu će biti pretežno oblačno, povremeno sa slabom kišom. Vetar će biti umeren i jak, jugoistočni. Jutarnja temperatura biće oko 12, a najviša dnevna oko 19 stepeni Celzijusa.U Srbiji će u ponedeljak biti promenljivo oblačno i relativno toplo, mestimično sa kišom. Duvaće umeren i jak, u planinskim predelima i na jugu Banata povremeno olujni, južni i jugoistočni vetar, koji će posle podne i uveče kratkotrajno oslabiti. U utorak će biti toplo uz kratkotrajno razvedravanje, a u sredu novo naoblačenje mestimično sa kišom uz skretanje vetra na severozapadni pravac.U Beogradu se predvidja slično vreme u istom periodu.Biometeorološka prognoza za nedelju, 3. novembar:Usled biometeoroloških prilika oprez je neophodan kod osoba sa varirajućim krvnim pritiskom i psihičkim tegobama. Od meteoropatskih reakcija moguće su pospanost i promenlјivo raspoloženje.
text:
Tomorrow mostly cloudy, partly cloudy with light rain

02 Nov 2019, 11:15

In Serbia it will be mostly cloudy tomorrow, partly with light rain, while more precipitation is expected in the west and southwest, said the Republic Hydro-Meteorological Institute (RHMZ). The wind will be light and moderate, with occasional heavy, southern and the southeast, which will reach storm surges in the south of Banat as well. The morning temperature will be from 7 to 12, and the highest daily will be from 16 to 22 degrees Celsius. In Belgrade it will be mostly cloudy, occasionally with light rain. The wind will be moderate and strong, southeast. The morning temperature will be around 12 and the highest daily will be around 19 degrees Celsius. In Serbia, it will be partly cloudy and relatively warm on Monday, partly with rain. The wind will be moderate and strong, with occasionally stormy, southerly and southeastern winds in the mountainous areas and in the south of Banat, which will weaken in the afternoon and evening. Tuesday will be warm with brief periods of clearing, and Wednesday a new cloudy with occasional rain with a drift of wind to the northwest. A similar weather forecast is expected in Belgrade on Sunday, November 3: Due to biometeorological conditions caution is needed in people with varying blood pressure and psychological distress. Meteropathic reactions may cause drowsiness and mood swings.
